outputs.name: ext_wall_area
outputs.description:
A number for the total area of walls in the honeybee rooms
with an Outdoors boundary condition (in Rhino model units).

outputs.name: ext_win_area
outputs.description:
A number for the total area of windows in the honeybee rooms
with an Outdoors boundary condition (in Rhino model units).

outputs.name: volume
outputs.description: A number for the volume of the honeybee rooms (in Rhino model units).

outputs.name: floor_area
outputs.description:
A number for the floor area  of the honeybee rooms (in Rhino
model units). When a Model is connected, the floor area will exclude
plenums and other Rooms with that have a True exclude_floor_area
property.

outputs.name: floor_ep_constr
outputs.description:
A number for the floor area of the Room accounting for the thickness
of EnergyPlus wall constructions. (in Rhino model units). When a
Model is connected, the floor area will exclude plenums and other
Rooms with that have a True exclude_floor_area property.

inputs.name: _rooms
inputs.description:
A list of honeybee Rooms for which or geometry properties will be output.
This can also be an entire honeybee Model.

name: HB Geometry Properties
description:
Get geometry properties of honeybee Rooms or a honeybee Model.
